entry.title: Phillip-Kemper/mcp-analytics-middleware: A lightweight TypeScript middleware for MCP SDK servers that delivers analytics. Captures request metrics, performance data, and usage patterns with minimal overhead. Features real-time monitoring, configurable data collection, and detailed reporting - all with full type safety.
entry.content: A lightweight TypeScript middleware for MCP SDK servers that delivers analytics. Captures request metrics, performance data, and usage patterns with minimal overhead. Features real-time monitoring, configurable data collection, and detailed reporting - all with full type safety.

entry.title: thegreedymaster1234/JavaScript-Email-Protection-JEP: JavaScript Email Protection (JEP) is a simple and lightweight way to keep your email safe from spam bots. Instead of leaving your email exposed in plain HTML (where bots can easily grab it), this script dynamically inserts it using JavaScriptâ€”making it way harder for scrapers to detect.
entry.content: JavaScript Email Protection (JEP) is a simple and lightweight way to keep your email safe from spam bots. Instead of leaving your email exposed in plain HTML (where bots can easily grab it), this script dynamically inserts it using JavaScriptâ€”making it way harder for scrapers to detect.

entry.title: diesel-core/diesel: Diesel is a simple and lightweight HTTP server library for Bunjs, designed to give you control over your API routes and middleware in an intuitive and efficient way. With DieselJS, you can quickly set up a server, define routes, and optimize important routes for faster response times.
entry.content: Diesel is a simple and lightweight HTTP server library for Bunjs, designed to give you control over your API routes and middleware in an intuitive and efficient way. With DieselJS, you can quickly set up a server, define routes, and optimize important routes for faster response times.

entry.title: l7aromeo/meocord: MeoCord Framework - lightweight and extensible framework designed for building Discord bots. With its modular architecture, support for TypeScript, and seamless integration with Discord.js, MeoCord simplifies bot development with a focus on flexibility, scalability, and modularity.
entry.content: MeoCord Framework - lightweight and extensible framework designed for building Discord bots. With its modular architecture, support for TypeScript, and seamless integration with Discord.js, MeoCord simplifies bot development with a focus on flexibility, scalability, and modularity.

entry.title: Sidmaz666/peachy: Peachy is a very minimal, lightweight, secure, and reactive front-end framework designed for building Single Page Applications (SPAs). It offers a robust state management system (local, global and global with persistence), file-based routing, and a component-based architecture with full reactivity.
entry.content: Peachy is a very minimal, lightweight, secure, and reactive front-end framework designed for building Single Page Applications (SPAs). It offers a robust state management system (local, global and global with persistence), file-based routing, and a component-based architecture with full reactivity.
